code: import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useState}from'react';import{Container,Card,Form,Button,Alert}from'react-bootstrap';import SimsService from'../services/sims';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SimulationSetup(){const{id:gameId}=useParams();const nav=useNavigate();const[formWeight,setFW]=useState(0.5);const[trials,setTrials]=useState(10000);const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const run=async()=>{const doc=await SimsService.createSimulation({gameId,userId:'demo',params:{formWeight,trials}});setResult(doc.result);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"pb-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"p-4 shadow-sm mx-auto",style:{maxWidth:600},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-4 fw-semibold",children:"Simulation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Label,{children:["Recent-form weight: ",formWeight]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Range,{min:0,max:1,step:0.1,value:formWeight,onChange:e=>setFW(Number(e.target.value))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Label,{children:["Trials: ",trials.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Range,{min:1000,max:20000,step:1000,value:trials,onChange:e=>setTrials(Number(e.target.value))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:run,children:"Run"}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Alert,{variant:"info",className:"mt-4",children:["Model result: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["Home ",Math.round(result.homeWinPct*100),"%"]})," \xB7",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[" Away ",Math.round(result.awayWinPct*100),"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",className:"mt-2",onClick:()=>nav('/my-sims'),children:"Go to My Sims"})]})});}export default SimulationSetup;
